game.name: Foodtruck Arena
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Foodtruck Arena an unconventional mix of car combat and football game, combines two things that make the world go round: food and sports. Become one of the legendary chefs, take part in an unforgettable tournament, battle against formidable opponents, and climb to the top of the culinary world!
